thread.section_title: Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cute boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Cute boutique hotel - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: jennifersatt
title: Cute boutique hotel
text: This hotel is great for the price. It is located in the hustings which is nice to see the local life it is difficult for cars to get to though due to it being so narrow. The rooms are kinda small but we had enough room. The price is right. The staff was helpful. The breakfast was ok. Overall I would recommend this hotel in Beijing.
